To transport all the items from a warehouse:

Truck A needs 20 trips Truck B needs 15 trips Truck C needs 12 trips

Questions:

(1) If Truck A would take 9 trips to carry a certain load, how many trips would it take if Trucks B and C work together?

(2) All 3 trucks (A, B, and C) make 2 trips together, then the remaining items are carried by B and C.

How many more trips (with B and C together) are needed to complete the job?

ğŸ“ Hint

- Add the number of apples in each box.

- Simple addition!
